briefTitle: A Comparison of Traditional and MOSES Laser Enucleation of the Prostate (MOLEP): A Prospective, Randomized, Double-blinded Control Trial A Comparison of Traditional and MOSES Laser Enucleation of the Prostate (MOLEP): A Prospective, Randomized, Double-blinded Control Trial

interventionNames: Procedure: Moses laser enucleation of prostate

armGroups.label: Moses Holmium Laser Enucleation of Prostate
interventionNames: Procedure: Moses laser enucleation of prostate

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Any man with clinical symptoms fo BPH requiring surgery who has a prostate sized at greater than 80 grams

Exclusion Criteria:

* Anyone actively on anticoagulation perioperatively

outcomeMeasures.title: Operative Time
outcomeMeasures.description: time for surgery to take place

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Change of Hematocrit
outcomeMeasures.description: Blood loss is calculated by the percentage of change of hematocrit
